Colors

Fajny CSS has its own color palette. If you want to use your own colors, you can edit them in the file scss/_colors.scss. You can find a nice color palette generator here: https://coolors.co/

File to include

@include "colors";

Results

  • $primary
    Hex: #1B4568
    RGBA: (27, 69, 104, 1)
  • $secondary
    Hex: #266DD3
    RGBA: (28, 109, 211, 1)
  • $danger
    Hex: #FF312E
    RGBA: (255, 49, 46, 1)
  • $success
    Hex: #97DB4F
    RGBA: (151, 219, 79, 1)
  • $warning
    Hex: #F46036
    RGBA: (244, 96, 54, 1)
  • $black
    Hex: #000103
    RGBA: (0, 1, 3, 1)
  • $white
    Hex: #FFFFFF
    RGBA: (255, 255, 255, 1)
  • $dark-gray
    Hex: #1B1B1B
    RGBA: (27, 27, 27, 1)
  • $gray
    Hex: #767676
    RGBA: (118, 118, 118, 1)
  • $light-gray
    Hex: #C6C6C6
    RGBA: (198, 198, 198, 1)
  • $lighter-gray
    Hex: #DDDDDD
    RGBA: (221, 221, 221, 1)
